questions.question: What do you go by in the industry? Your screen name or handle?
Mind sharing your real name too? Always good to know who I'm chatting with.
What's your go-to camera setup? Like, what gear do you usually work with?
How would you describe your visual style? Like, what's your vibe when you're behind the camera?
Are you into color grading yourself, or do you prefer to light for the grade?
What kind of projects do you usually work on? Features, shorts, music videos, commercials?
Got a reel or some work online I could check out? Always curious to see people's stuff.
Which languages are you comfortable working in on set?
You actively taking on new projects right now, or just keeping an eye out?
Where are you based? Always helps to know for potential collabs.
Who are you looking to connect with? Directors, producers, other DPs?
What's your stage name or the name you use professionally?
And your real name? Just so I know who I'm talking to.
How would you describe your acting approach? Method, classical, somewhere in between?
What genres do you gravitate towards? Drama, comedy, action, experimental?
Where'd you train, or are you self-taught? Always interesting to hear people's journeys.
What kind of projects are you into? Theatre, film, TV, commercials?
Got a reel or clips somewhere? Would love to see your work.
What languages can you perform in?
Any special skills? Like accents, stunts, dance, music?
You auditioning actively right now or being selective?
Where are you based?
Looking to connect with directors, casting directors, other actors?
What name do you go by in post circles?
And your actual name? Nice to put a real name to the work.
What's your editing setup? Premiere, Avid, DaVinci, Final Cut?
How would you describe your editing style? Fast-paced, contemplative, invisible cuts?
What kind of content do you usually cut? Narrative, docs, commercials, music videos?
Do you handle color and audio too, or strictly picture editing?
Got a reel or some cuts I could check out?
What's your typical turnaround like? Quick cuts or do you like to marinate?
You set up for remote work, or prefer being in the suite?
Taking on new projects right now?
Where are you based? Or are you fully remote?
Looking to connect with directors, producers, other post folks?
What's your writer name or pen name?
And your real name? Always good to know.
What do you like to write? Drama, comedy, thriller, sci-fi?
Features, TV, shorts, web series? What's your format?
Are you an outliner or do you just dive in and see where it goes?
Got any completed scripts or produced work?
Any samples online, or scripts you're comfortable sharing?
You prefer writing solo or do you like writers' rooms and collaboration?
Working on anything specific right now, or between projects?
Open to new writing gigs or script doctor work?
Where are you based? Or does location not matter for your work?
Looking to connect with directors, producers, other writers?
What's your director name or how do you credit yourself?
And your real name? Just to know who I'm talking with.
How would you describe your directing approach? Collaborative, auteur, somewhere in between?
What genres speak to you? What kind of stories do you want to tell?
What scale do you usually work at? Shorts, features, commercials, music videos?
Are you super visual and storyboard everything, or more about finding it on set?
Got a reel or some work I could check out?
Working on anything right now, or in development?
Usually looking for any specific crew positions? DPs, editors, etc?
Open to new projects or pretty booked up?
Where are you based? Do you travel for projects?
Who are you looking to connect with? Producers, DPs, writers?
What's your professional name in the industry?
And your real name? Good to know who's behind the projects.
What kind of producing do you do? Line producing, creative producing, EP?
What scale projects do you usually work on? Indies, studio, commercials?
Any particular genres you gravitate towards?
What budget ranges are you comfortable working with?
What have you produced recently that you're proud of?
Got anything in development right now?
How do you like to build your teams? Through recommendations, past collaborators?
Looking for new projects to jump on?
Where are you based? Do you work locally or travel?
Who are you looking to meet? Directors, writers, other producers?
What name do you use on set? How do people know you?
And your real name? Always nice to know.
First AD, Second AD, or do you float between roles?
What scale productions do you usually work on? Indies, commercials, big budget?
What's your go-to for scheduling? Movie Magic, StudioBinder, old school strips?
How would you describe your style with crew? Military precision or more collaborative?
What have you AD'd recently that you're proud of?
Studio work, location work, or both? Any preference?
Looking for new projects or pretty booked up?
Where are you based?

And your real name?

Where are you at in your journey? Film school, self-taught, first few projects?
Working on anything right now? Short film, web series, feature script?
What kind of stories do you want to tell?
What are you focusing on learning right now?
Got any work online, even if it's early stuff?
Looking to collaborate on projects or focused on your own stuff?
Where are you based?
Who would you love to work with or learn from?
What's your professional name in post circles?
And your real name?
What's your thing? Foley, ADR, mixing, field recording, all of it?
Pro Tools, Logic, Reaper? What's your setup?
Features, docs, games, commercials? What do you usually work on?
